## About

I wanted a tool to help me learn playing piano, specifically reading music quickly and hitting the correct keys.

## Roadmap

- [x] Landing Page
- [x] Generating random notes
- [x] Render notes using Vexflow
- [ ] Virtual keyboard
- [ ] MIDI integration
- [ ] Training mode
- [ ] Arcade mode
